artist: Engraver: Simon Wynouts Frisius; Publisher: Hendrik Hondius I
description: portrait of Michael Coxcie; three quarter length; facing left looking at viewer; easel behind and painting of naked woman above left;
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black upper left:[con privilegio]; in plate in black center left:[S. frisius f.]; in plate in black upper right quadrant: [Hh exe.]; in plate in black below image: [MICHAEL COEXIUS, MECHILNIENS/ PICTOR / Coxius illus tris pictor, Mechlinia cujus/ Patria, doctorum quae fuit artificium/ Hic magno pinxit. nam Zeuqis credutur esse: /Carus divitiibus principibisque Viris.]
title: Michael Coexius Mechliniens Pictor
